content.prompt:
• The horizontal axis is labeled Ounces and ranges from 0 to 8 in increments of 1. 
  • The vertical axis is labeled Cost (in dollars) and ranges from 0 to 4 in increments of 1.
  •  The graph is composed of six sections, each a horizontal line segment. 
  • The line segments are as follows:
  • from (0 comma 2.54) to (3 comma 2.54), marked with a closed circle
  • from (3 comma 2.74), marked with an open circle, to (4 comma 2.74), marked with a closed circle
  • from (4 comma 2.94), marked with an open circle, to (5 comma 2.94), marked with a closed circle
  • from (5 comma 3.14), marked with an open circle, to (6 comma 3.14), marked with a closed circle
  • from (6 comma 3.34), marked with an open circle, to (7 comma 3.34), marked with a closed circle
  • from (7 comma 3.54), marked with an open circle, to (8 comma 3.54), marked with a closed circle

​In 2016, the cost to mail a package was $2.54 for up to 3 ounces, plus an additional cost of $0.20 for each additional ounce or portion of an ounce less than a full ounce. A portion of the graph of this relationship is given with cost, in dollars, as a function of ounces. Which of the following describes the restrictions on the range for such a function?

choices.label: ​The range is positive real numbers.
​The range is values of the form 2.54+0.2x, where x is a nonnegative real number.
​The range is values of the form 2.54+0.2x, where x is a nonnegative integer.

topic.text: 1.13: Function Model Selection and Assumption Articulation

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify information from graphical, numerical, analytical, and verbal representations to answer a question or construct a model, with and without technology.
